name: Newbit Arcade Shield Expansion Board for Micro:bit V2
description: KittenBot Newbit Arcade Shield is an expansion board developed exclusively for Micro:bit V2. It provides Micro:bit V2 the ability not only to be a console, but also to create programmable games. Equipped with the Newbit Arcade Shield, you can use Micro:bit to design games online in MakeCodeArcade, or play games offline, which will broaden your experience of programming with Micro:bit V2.
